ygData.subject: Re: bronze weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: consider yourself lucky to have a higher level friend willing to get you that special item... I just love trying to hit something that s INVULNERABLE. Does
ygData.messageBody:
consider yourself lucky to have a higher level friend willing to get you that special item... I just love trying to hit something that's INVULNERABLE.

Does anyone know so far which 2H weapons does the most damage with little lag time? I know as spell casters, we rely mostly on our spells, but I it's fun to get my hand's dirty every once in a while :)

Also, I've notice that guilds don't sell the complete spells for each level (ie Mercyl's Animation, and Enchant Silver (would love to try my luck at making magical jewelry)). Are these truely Uncommon/Rare as EverQuest Stratics say they are?

Ceen
Xegony Server
Freeport Enchanter
---





On Wed, 21 Apr 1999 17:53:46 Randy Balduff wrote:
>From: "Randy Balduff" <tovan@...>
>
>Greetings all,
>I have read with great interest some of the rants on this here list and I
>have to tell ya, y'all are hilarious. Everyone has their points and they
>are good points. 2cp's worth.
>
>Now, on to the reply...
>I was fortunate enuf to have a higher level friend who obtained for me the
>ruined totem staff, there is a certain ghoul that has taken more of my lives
>than anything else and I asked him to get it for me for the sole purpose of
>retribution, big time!! as for hitting other creatures with it, I hardly
>use melee anymore, and I am only 10th lvl, but the Magic properties of this
>fine weapon, the hitting of magical creatures, is well worth carrying it,
>and besides, I could always sell it for the 3p+ I was offered for it from
>the merchants.
>
>Tovan
>Rathe lake server
>Felwithe city enchanter
>
>
